mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM PAYMENT_DETAILS WHERE HOSP_NUM = #{hospNum} ORDER BY PD_ID DESC

SELECT ME.HOSPITAL_USE AS inHospitalTotal, ME.PATIENT_USE AS outpatientTotal, ME.HOSPITAL_USE + ME.PATIENT_USE AS medicalTotal FROM ( SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN MARGIN_TYPE = 1 THEN ISNULL( HOSPITAL_USE, 0 ) ELSE - 1 * ISNULL( HOSPITAL_USE, 0 ) END ) AS HOSPITAL_USE, SUM( CASE WHEN MARGIN_TYPE = 1 THEN ISNULL( PATIENT_USE, 0 ) ELSE - 1 * ISNULL( PATIENT_USE, 0 ) END ) AS PATIENT_USE FROM PAYMENT_DETAILS ) ME

SELECT PD.ID_CARD AS samIdCard,PD.serial_number AS samSerialNumberSam,EMP.emp_name AS samOperator, PD.serial_number_his AS samSerialNumberHis,PD.pay_date AS samTradeDate,PD.MARGIN_TYPE samPayType, CASE WHEN PD.MARGIN_TYPE = 1 AND PD.TYPE = 1 THEN PD.HOSPITAL_USE WHEN PD.MARGIN_TYPE = 1 AND PD.TYPE = 2 THEN PD.PATIENT_USE ELSE 0 END AS samCharge, CASE WHEN PD.MARGIN_TYPE = 1 THEN '住院' WHEN PD.MARGIN_TYPE = 2 THEN '门诊' ELSE '-' END AS samChargeType, CASE WHEN PD.MARGIN_TYPE = 2 AND PD.TYPE = 1 THEN PD.HOSPITAL_USE WHEN PD.MARGIN_TYPE = 2 AND PD.TYPE = 2 THEN PD.PATIENT_USE ELSE 0 END AS samRefund, CASE WHEN PD.payment = 1 THEN '现金' WHEN PD.payment = 2 THEN '银行卡' WHEN PD.payment = 3 THEN '微信' ELSE '支付宝' END AS samPayMethod FROM PAYMENT_DETAILS PD LEFT JOIN employee EMP ON PD.REVISER = EMP.id WHERE PD.TYPE IN (1,2)
AND CONVERT(varchar(100), PD.pay_date, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{startDate}, 23)
AND CONVERT(varchar(100), #{endDate}, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100), PD.pay_date, 23)
AND PD.ID_CARD LIKE '%' + #{idCard} + '%'
AND PD.serial_number LIKE '%' + #{serialNumber} + '%'
AND PD.payment = #{payMethod}
AND PD.MARGIN_TYPE = #{payType}
ORDER BY PD.pay_date DESC

WITH mycte AS ( SELECT CAST(#{begDatesTime} AS DATETIME) DateValue UNION ALL SELECT DateValue + 1 FROM mycte WHERE #{endDatesTime} >= DateValue + 1 ) SELECT CONVERT(varchar(100), A.DateValue, 23) AS text FROM mycte A OPTION (MAXRECURSION 0)

SELECT * FROM PAYMENT_DETAILS S WHERE S.ID_CARD = #{idCard} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 100 ), pay_date, 23 ) pay_date, MAX( PD_ID ) PD_ID FROM PAYMENT_DETAILS GROUP BY CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 100 ), pay_date, 23 ) ) SS WHERE SS.PD_ID = S.PD_ID )
